comments:
Description:
   the dataset is not supported in Eclipse 3.0.1

Step to Reproduce
1. create a datasouce(except for flat File)
2. create a dataset

Expected results:
   a dataset is created

Actual results
   throw out an error: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError
